import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import SideMenu from './SideMenu' import TableOne from './TableOne' function Summary(props) { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [folder_ct, setFolder_ct] = (0); useEffect(() => { for (let i = 0; i < props.folders.length; i++) { for (let j = 0; j < props.folders[i].data.length; j++) { setProducts(products=>[...products, props.folders[i].data[j]]); } } }, []); return ( <>
